name: UNexpectED (glas)
description:
4 short games of different genres, artstyles, mechanics, etc. The games are based on the 1st 2 and last 2 letters of "Unexpected".

**The unlock mechanic is currently not applied in the game. Ignore any instructions about them. The game may or may not suffer from a lack of playtesting and is not as polished as the creator would have liked, so please comment any bugs you've encountered. Feedback is much appreciated. 

The game will be updated in the later half of the voting period. So if you're interested,  just add it to a collection. :) **

This game was made in 7 days for the Unexpected Gamejam. 

Game Information

U - Unbelievably Ugly - A game with a fairytale artsyle. You have to complete tasks in a limited period of time.

N - No Sight No Sound - A game with a gameplay switching randomly from No SIght and No Sound mode.

E - End of the World - A game about mixing ingredients to destroy the entire world in unexpected ways. (kinda dumb ways)

D - Death is not the end - A game about an essence exploring the "afterlife".

Credits:

Special Thanks to @amamakeart for most of the art.

Zapsplat - sfx
